titleStmt.title: Description of British Library, Or 1470: The Hafṭarot for the whole year.

notesStmt.note: Ḥalfon ben Se῾adyah ben Daṿid Al-Tawili: inscribed in the colophon, folio 78v.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The Hafṭarot for the whole year.

msItem.title: The Hafṭarot for the whole year.

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 2 ; ruled lines: 25; written lines: 25; Uniform layout. Visible pricking and hard-point ruling. Hair side and flesh side of folios distinguishable. Catchwords on every page.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite square and semi-cursive script of the 15th century. Daṿid ben Benayah ben Se῾adyah ben Zekhariah: inscribed in the colophon, folio 78v.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Haphtaroth with Targum. Hebrew & Aramaic. Brit. Mus. Oriental Ms. 1470.'
